resources.string: banksampah
Here you can distinguish and sort each type of garbage properly. You can also easily sell your trash at the nearest trash bank. And get your coins!
Make transactions with ease and redeem your coins with various attractive prizes
Here you can find out how each separated waste can be recycled into useful and reusable items.
You can visit the GreenT location or we will pick up your trash. So transact with your waste so that it doesnt pile up and can be reused.
"Container for organic food waste. Later this waste can be used as compost."
"With this trash can it can be easier to use it as a recycled craft or recycling in the factory."
"This type of waste must be separated because it usually comes from B3 (Bahan Berbahaya Beracun)."
"This type of trash can is intended for residual waste. Non-recyclable waste. such as diapers, cigarette butts, styrofoam and used tissues"

Green Treasure is a digital waste bank that functions to increase awareness of the people of Padang City to dispose of waste in a disciplined manner and can help reduce waste in Padang City.

Green Treasure
